title._content: Image taken from page 50 of 'The Pictorial History of the United States of America, from the discovery by the Northmen in the tenth century to the present time. Embellished with engravings from drawings by W. Croome'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Pictorial History of the United States of America, from the discovery by the Northmen in the tenth century to the present time. Embellished with engravings from drawings by W. Croome" Author: FROST, John - LL.D Contributor: Croome, William Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1447.h.10-11." Volume: 02 Page: 50 Place of Publishing: Philadelphia Date of Publishing: 1843 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001335586 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
